text:
e="preserve">Image:Rosemary Harris Spiderman 2007 Shankbone.jpg|thumb|Rosemary Harris 2007
Rosemary Harris (born September 19, 1927) is an English movie and stage actress. She starred in the "Spider-Man" movie series, "Being Julia", and many others. She was born in Ashby-de-la-Zouch, Leicestershire.
Harris was married to novelist John Ehle from 1967 until his death in 2018. They had one daughter, Jennifer Ehle.
